name: Knight Platformer (juanyfanga)
description:
This is my fourth game made for "The Most Comprehensive Guide To Unity Game Development" which is a Udemy Course.

This is a platformer game in which you have to get to the door and go through all of the levels. Enjoy 10 different levels with their own challenges. Enjoy and have fun!

CONTROLS:

WASD: To move.

SPACE: To jump.
